sentences.en: A venal moving - van company had revealed her address.
sentences.cn: 一家唯利是图的搬运汽车公司还是把她的住址泄露了.

sentences.en: Crowded Haiti has long suffered from squabbling and venal politicians, extreme inequality and ecological stress.
sentences.cn: 臃肿的海地长期经受着聒噪和惟利是图的政客, 极度的不公正,生态压力所困扰.

sentences.en: Ellis was a venal, sly man.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯是个贪财 、 奸诈的人.

sentences.en: In Ghana and Cameroon this has allowed venal village chiefs to steal logging revenues.
sentences.cn: 在加纳和喀麦隆,这让贪赃枉法的村长得以窃取伐木收入.

sentences.en: We've grown vulgar and venal, wedded to the almighty dollar and the lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 我们已经变得越来越粗俗和贪婪, 紧紧地和致上的金钱和最低的共同欲望结合起来.

words.tran_cn: 唯利是图地；以权谋私地；受贿地
唯利是图；贪赃枉法；受贿
[法]贪污的；用金钱买得的；贿赂的；贪赃枉法的

trans.tran_cn: <正式，贬>贪赃的，贪污的，（行为）腐败的，为钱而干的
trans.tran_en: willing to use power and influence in a dishonest way in return for money
